Class Game

    • java.util.Observable

extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String gameModeString,
            int record,
            int limitWords,
            int lowFrecuency,
            int highFrecuency,
            java.lang.String gameModeId)
        Game constructor
        Parameters:
        gameModeString - String representing the game mode
        record - Integer representing the user's maximum punctuation in a certain level
        limitWords - Integer representing the maximum number of words for a certain level
        lowFrecuency - Integer representing the low frequency of use allowed for words in a certain level
        highFrecuency - Integer representing the high frequency of use allowed for words in a certain level
        gameModeId - String representing the game mode id
